chinese: 采采芣苢、薄言采之。采采芣苢、薄言有之。
english: We gather and gather the plantains;Now we may gather them.We gather and gather the plantains;Now we have got them.

chinese: 采采芣苢、薄言掇之。采采芣苢、薄言捋之。
english: We gather and gather the plantains;Now we pluck the ears.We gather and gather the plantains;Now we rub out the seeds.

chinese: 采采芣苢、薄言袺之。采采芣苢、薄言襭之。
english: We gather and gather the plantains;Now we place the seeds in our skirts.We gather and gather the plantains;Now we tuck out skirts under our girdles.
